profile.summary:
An active and self-motivated Recruitment Marketing professional for whom 'Humility' would be the apt word to describe.

Currently, I work for Leokraft Technologies (Bengaluru, India) and Flexday Solutions LLC (Illinois, USA) which are the partner advisory and implementation services organizations in AI, ML and cloud solutions for global enterprises.

I can help your brand to grow through well-planned and dynamic Marketing Communication strategies. Also, I can very well start a conversation and make the most out of it by unearthing new business opportunities and paving way for quality Networking.

Skills: MS Office, Facebook Ads, Google Ads and Analytics, Social Media Marketing, Content Marketing, Content Creation, Search Engine Optimization, Market Research, Inbound Marketing, Recruitment Management, Talent Acquisition, Team Building, and Public Speaking.

A soulful listener, creative thinker and keen enthusiast of self-development, as I keep myself open for exciting opportunities to new learnings.

For any Content Marketing and Brand Promotion projects, feel free to contact me at, email: (sonalisaikia3@gmail.com)
profile.headline: Hiring Sr. Full-Stack Engineers | Technical Recruitment | Content Marketing | Employer Branding

experience.description: Flexday Solutions LLC is a research based advisory and implementation services in AI, ML and cloud solutions from Naperville, Illinois.
experience.title: Recruitment Marketing Manager

experience.description:
Leokraft Technologies is a Bangalore based startup focused currently on working with the select Fortune 200 clients in owning the development of strategic technology platforms.

They also have a partner advisory and implementation services team known as 'Flexday Solutions LLC' in Naperville, Illinois, USA.

A summary of responsibilities:
1. Plan and implement a recruitment marketing and employer branding strategy to 
attract high-quality applicants.
2. Plan and manage marketing media campaigns, newsletters, blogging on social 
media, LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook etc. 
3. Track, measure and report on recruitment and marketing campaign results.
4. Create and implement strategies for building a talent network/talent community.
5. Design and plan recruiting events.
6. Serve as brand ambassador at various events, like career fairs or on-campus 
recruiting events.
7. Communicate and work closely with the HR department to develop creative ways for addressing recruitment challenges.
8. Suggest new ideas for improving candidate experience and engagement.
9. Research marketing and advertising trends in the staffing industry.
10. Keep abreast of new trends in social media channels.
experience.title: Recruitment Marketing Manager

experience.description:
After successfully completing my training period, I was offered the position of 'Marketing Communications Specialist'.

Roles and responsibilities handled:
1. Branding of the company.
2. Conduct market research and analysis to evaluate trends, brand awareness, and competition ventures.
3. Execute marketing campaigns- email, social media, etc.
4. Preparation and presentation of results from campaigns.
5. Follow up and qualify contacts from web registrations, promotions, events, sales, and other marketing activities.
6. PR Management and participation in the corporate events representing the firm.
7. Content marketing to the target audience in a lucid language.
8. To build and cultivate prospect relationships by initiating and conducting follow-up communications to move opportunities through the sales funnel.
9. Conducting webinars and creating vlogs to highlight delivered projects and accomplishments.
10. Prospecting for new clients/lead generation.
experience.title: Marketing Communications Specialist

experience.description:
TechVariable is a tech product development company from Assam with a regional office in Bangalore. I have been hired here to work with the Management team and use my skills for the growth of our organization.

I began my journey with extensive training while honing my Digital Marketing skills. Along with proper guidance and support from my managers at CXO levels of the respective matrix organization, I got opportunities to wear both the hats of Marketing and HR- Recruitment Management.
experience.title: Management Trainee
